TopicTitle: stop the other craft from spinning in irbital rendezvous

Articles.Content: How on earth do you stop the other craft from spinning in orbit when not in that craft

You can't yet.

Best you can do is quickly switch to the craft with whatever keys you have mapped. Stop the rolling then switch back.

The rolling should not be as bad, or may be gone in 0.17. When docking is added, we can expect a proper solution.
